moves.name: X Attack
moves.effect: Raises the user’s Attack by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Darkest Lariat
moves.effect: Ignores the target’s raised stats when attacking with this move.

moves.name: Ready...Fight!
moves.effect: Raises the user’s evasiveness by 1 stat rank. Raises the Speed of all allied sync pairs by 3 stat ranks.

syncMove.name: Heel Turn Malicious Moonsault
syncMove.description: The more the user’s Speed has been raised, the greater the power of this move.

passives.name: Terrify 1
passives.description: Lowers the Attack of all opposing sync pairs by 1 stat rank when the user enters a battle.

passives.name: Dominating Sync 5
passives.description: Powers up the user’s sync moves when the target’s Attack is lowered.

passives.name: Dishearten 9
passives.description: Lowers the target’s Attack or Defense—or both—by one stat rank when the user’s move targeting that opponent is successful.

grid.bonus: X Attack:MP Refresh 3- Has a chance (40%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Brutal Swing:Move Gauge Refresh 4- Has a chance (50%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Darkest Lariat:Move Gauge Refresh 4- Has a chance (50%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Ready...Fight!:Move Gauge Refresh 4- Has a chance (50%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Terrify 1- Lowers the Attack of all opposing sync pairs by 1 stat rank when the user enters a battle.
Power Reserves 5- Powers up the user’s moves when in a pinch.
Shifty Striker 1- Has a chance (20%) of raising the user’s evasiveness by one stat rank when its Pokémon uses a move.
Ridicure 1- Has a chance (20%) of restoring the user’s HP by approximately 20% of its maximum HP when an opponent’s attack move targeting the user misses.
Ramming Speed- The more the user’s Speed is raised, the more it powers up the user’s moves.
Pecking Order- The more the target’s Attack is lowered, the more it powers up the user’s sync moves.
Bob and Weave- The more the user’s evasiveness is raised, the more it powers up the user’s moves.
Demoralize 2- Lowers the Attack of all opposing sync pairs by 2 stat ranks after using the user’s sync move.
Insult to Injury- The more the target’s Defense is lowered, the more it powers up the user’s moves.
Power Posture- The more the target’s Attack is lowered, the more it powers up the user’s moves.
Slippery Slope 9- Raises the user’s evasiveness by one stat rank when an opponent’s attack move targeting the user misses.
